description:
This endpoint provides live top and breaking headlines for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources. You can also search with keywords. Articles are sorted by the earliest date published first.

This endpoint is great for retrieving headlines for use with news tickers or similar.
name: theclique_top_headlines

description: The ultimate solution for accessing live top and breaking headlines with unparalleled accuracy and speed. This endpoint provides comprehensive coverage for a country, specific category in a country, single source, or multiple sources, ensuring you never miss out on important news. With powerful keyword search capabilities and articles sorted by the earliest date published first, it is perfect for news tickers or any application requiring timely and relevant headlines. Experience the most reliable and versatile news retrieval available.
